radiographic_examinations.findings: Significant aortic thrombosis below the superior mesenteric artery (SMA) level with involvement of the left renal artery and infarction of the lower and mid poles of the left kidney. The thrombus extended down to the iliac arteries, with a resumption of blood flow in the femoral arteries through two collateral blood supplies.
Diffuse osteopenia and several vertebral compression fractures.
Low bone mineral density (BMD), with lumbar spine Z-scores of -1.7, femoral neck Z score of -2.3, and hip Z-score of -2.2.
